education.title: Bachelors of Science in Engineering, Computer Engineering
coursework: Object-Oriented Programming in C++ and Java

description: Investigated methods to identify hazardous leaks in industrial liners using high-impedance electrical systems.
Designed an embedded system to measure and model the surface voltage of in-soil current injection and correlate data with a GPS receiver using Python, Computer-Aided Design, and MATLAB.
Identified hazardous leaks in industrial liners and coordinating with clients and contractors at industrial worksites.

employment.company: Texas Facial Plastic Surgery and ENT
description: Consulted the family-owned practice on software solutions for graphic, media, and UI/UX challenges.

Developed a web-content scraping Selenium VBA script in partnership with marketing company Aesthetic Brand Marketing. Successfully transfered HTML material from the Texas Facial Plastic Surgery and ENT's DermPro website to Shopify.

employment.company: Developing interactive panoramic virtual tour and frontend website content with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Kuula.
description: Designing interactive panoramic virtual tour and frontend website content with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Kuula.
Developed a client-communication interface with HTML/CSS frontend and JavaScript/PHP backend.
Redesigned the company website using the Wix Development platform and Wix Velo script.
Developed software solutions for implementing and assessing microcontroller-based hardware and C/C++ software.
Created UI interfaces for live hardware verification with HTML/CSS frontend and JavaScript and Express.js on Node.js backend.
Worked with the Advanced Actuators team to develop embedded systems for electric motorcycle transmission, motor, and CANBUS systems.
Developing and researching software solutions for Industry 4.0 technology in an Agile framework environment.
Programmed Python software to mathematically analyze profile-shifted gear systems and predict gear interference events.
Wrote and maintained code and documentation in Git project repositories.

projects.name: GeoPlot-MATLAB
description: Developed software to plot large project worksites using iPhone GPS to collect data and Python/MATLAB to plot in 3D. The software is used to produce client deliverables and keep track of the location of industrial liner defects.

projects.name: Geoamperic Interpreter
description: Designed an embedded system to measure and model the surface voltage of in-soil current injection and correlate data with a GPS receiver using Python, Computer-Aided Design, and MATLAB.
The Geoamperic Interpreter uses a Raspberry Pi microcontroller and communicates with LCD display, GPS, and TI INA219 current sensor peripherals using UART, SPI, and I2C.
Python is used to process data and generate a Tkinter graphical user interface.

projects.name: Public Directory Data Collection Script
description: Wrote software using Selenium and Excel VBA to data-scrape HTML content from Purdue University's public student directory as market research for a student startup company.
Used Python to process demographic data collected from over 35,000 students.

projects.name: Optical Heart Rate Sensor
description: Independently designed electrical circuitry for an optical heart rate sensor. Amplified and filtered heart rate-induced changes in infrared reception from a photoresistive diode, output as a digital signal.

projects.name: DermPro Website Data Collection Program
projects.association: Texas Facial Plastic Surgery and ENT
description: Partnered with Aethetic Brand Marketing to assist in the redesign of RejuveMD's Shopify store.
Developed a Excel VBA program using Selenium/JavaScript to collect HTML data from 55 pages of DermPro UI content.

projects.name: Shortest Path Grid Traversal Program
description: Independently developed a C program capable of computing the shortest path across a weighted grid using graph theory, data structures, and runtime analysis.

projects.name: Digital WAV Player Embedded System
description: Worked with a team to build a digital .wav file player embedded system capable of playing 8-bit and 16-bit audio files.

The WAV Player designed featured a TFT LCD for frontend audio control (music selection from a directory and play/pause/next song), on-board SD card storage, and an audio jack on a custom PCB using SPI, DAC, DMA and GPIO.

projects.name: OrgAI
description: Independently developed a Python Artificial Intelligence program, which suggests organizations at Purdue University based upon keywords and iterative learning.
Collected HTML data and processed language from Purdue's Organization Directory in real time with Selenium Python browser automation.

projects.name: Alpen Aerial Client Project Brief
description: Independently designed a website for Alpen Aerial client-company communication with my custom Python to UI compiler, WebGen.
Developed a clean and beautiful HTML/CSS frontend with a JavaScript/PHP backend, giving both clients and contractors access to project-specific data.

projects.name: WebGen - Python to UI Compiler
description: Independently built a Python to HTML UI compiler, which uses object-oriented strategies to make optimize UI design.
Implemented CSS, JavaScript, and PHP integration through include files.
WebGen features global files to create components which are universally accessible across all webpages in a project.

projects.name: Repeat Rover
description: Served as the team leader on a team developing a remote-programmable vehicle for resource delivery in repeated process environments.
Developed embedded system components such as vehicle drive and wheel speed sensing.
Built the project website and controller interfaces using my custom-developed Python to UI compiler, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js.

projects.name: Shotglass
description: Independently developed a Python application to find user-curated jobs with respectful data scraping, while producing job-specific resume and cover letters.
Shotglass collects job post HTML data using Selenium Python and analyzes user resumes with a custom command line interface and hassle-free data processing.

projects.name: LogicSim
description: LogicSim provides an object-oriented alternative to hardware description languages such as Verilog by using Python classes to create logic systems. LogicSim was created to aid in the testing of ASIC system logic in a fast and efficient way.

special.name: Purdue Foundry Firestarter Startup Training Program
